name: Christmas House Decor&CleanUp
description:
Marry Christmas Everyone, Enjoy Christmas House Cleanup game here…

Give Your Dream House to a complete makeover and be prepared for the winter, Christmas and New Year.

Enjoy our Christmas Game with house cleaning and decoration with Christmas decoration. Do home cleaning activity in winter and get ready for new yer celebration. Make home welcoming for Santa Claus and fun for a party and family.
This is a home decoration game to visualise your creativity in home decoration, whether it’s inside or outside. So that home turn into the best winter holiday place in your society.

Give some special makeover to house in Christmas Vacation to make your dream home winter mansion, so that celebration get more exited for dreaming Christmas Wonderland. Decorate your home as beautifully as you can to make this holiday memorable. Decorate House with Christmas Lights to brighten night look. Additionally decorate Snow men and X-mas Tree in Garden, so that, house looks more beautiful. Choose a festive Christmas decorations i.e. Presents, Stars, beautiful lights, etc.

Add some holiday cheer by decorating kids room just in time for Christmas and New Years! Select unique items from different categories to decorate full house. Express your creativity by decorating fireplace, bed room, children room, SnowMen, and most importantly, Christmas tree! This is a relaxing and fun game that enables you to live the life from your Sweet Home. Design your own unique idea to impress others. Try different combinations of house decor. Santa will be coming down the chimney with gifts before you know it!

Features Included:
- Snow Men Decoration
- X-Mas Tree Decoration
- House Decoration
- Bed Room Decoration
- Kids Room Decoration
- Fire Place Decoration and ignite
- Select Items of your choice to decorate
- Easy to play
- Decorate Christmas tree with lights and gifts and candies
- help Santa Claus to make it more beautiful
- Easy navigation
- pleasing music
- Experience a wonderful gameplay
- Free and easy to play
- Full House cleaning in Christmas
- House Cleaning in Winter
- House Cleaning game with set of activities
- Christmas games free
- Christmas wonderland games free
- Christmas House cleaners
- Christmas House cleaning

Hope you enjoyed playing our Christmas House Cleaning Game and if you want more features for this game please leave a comment.
